EmailTemplate.name: Evaluation and RAIT Report
EmailTemplate.subject: Evaluation and RAIT Report - {!Job__c.Account_Name__c}, {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CC PRESENTER
Hi {!Job__c.Account_Sell_1_Name__c}
Attached are the evaluation and RAIT reports for the {!Job__c.Account_Name__c} program that took place on {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c}. OR Attached is the evaluation report for the {!Job__c.Account_Name__c} program that took place on {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c}.
Also attached is a list of the pax that have indicated they would like follow on support.
Cheers
